errors.invalid-website-name: The website's name can only consist of lowercase letters, numbers, and the characters _.-~, and must be between 3 and 50 characters in length.
errors.invalid-description: Description must contains UTF-8 characters only.
errors.invalid-file-content: Website file must contain index.html at the source.
errors.file-too-big: Website zip file is too big. Maximum size allowed is 1.5 MB.

unexpected-error.title: Oops!
unexpected-error.link: Go back to the Welcome page!
